title: Voice Calls
descr: Call your friends and family anywhere in the world, freely and securely thanks to end-to-end encryption. Calling uses your phone’s Internet connection rather than your cellular plan’s voice minutes. Data charges may apply.

title: Share Media
descr: Send pictures, videos, documents and music, without any limits on their type and size. No need to manually backup your chat history and files - everything will be securely stored in the Telegram cloud for as long as you need it.

title: Stickers & GIFs
descr: Send lovely, goofy, adorable, weird and expressive stickers to say just about anything or send GIFs like it's the 90s all over again!

title: The more the marrier
descr: Create group chats for up to 10,000 members with powerful fine grained admin tools. Broadcast public messages to even larger audiences with Channels.

title: Bots
descr: Access third-party services directly in Unigram with bots. They will provide many types of services – polls, news, games, integrations, e-butlers or cat images. Any dream can come true with bots.
